items.sentence: I need to know why you didn\'t come yesterday.

We won\'t have time to do anything else today.
We\'ll see each other tomorrow in the library.
We\'re facing a much bigger problem than that.
Tom didn\'t have enough money to pay the bill.
Tom didn\'t know when Mary had come to Boston.
Tom didn\'t notice that he was being followed.
Tom didn\'t seem interested in making friends.
I\'m not sure whether Tom will do that or not.
I\'m not surprised that Tom wanted to do that.
I\'m quite certain Tom did that intentionally.
How can you be sure that Tom doesn\'t do that?
Tom opened the door of the van and jumped out.
Tom opened the safe and took out his passport.
Tom owns a small piece of land in the country.
Tom hasn\'t seen Mary since they got divorced.
I wasn\'t surprised to see Tom at the concert.
I wish I could understand what you\'re saying.
Put the knives and forks back in the cupboard.
Put your hands up and step out of the vehicle.
Rhinos are killed by poachers for their horns.
Tom has been behaving rather strangely lately.
Mary doesn\'t ever kiss her husband in public.
Mary is not only beautiful, she\'s smart, too.
Tom was afraid he would hurt Mary\'s feelings.
My closet is full of things that I never wear.
I can\'t think of anything I\'d want from you.

I can\'t work with you if you don\'t trust me.
You don\'t speak French by any chance, do you?
You really don\'t want me to kiss you, do you?
The Olympic Games take place every four years.
The boy next door fell head first from a tree.
Tom picked up some pretty shells on the beach.
Tom seems to be about to ask another question.
In 2013, Tom married Mary and moved to Boston.
In 2013, Tom retired from professional tennis.
Tom and Mary kissed each other more than once.
Tom and Mary live with their father in Boston.
Tom has been bitten by Mary\'s dog many times.
Tom didn\'t get along with the other students.
Tom didn\'t get home until way after midnight.
Tom didn\'t have a good excuse for not coming.
Tom didn\'t have any reason not to trust Mary.

Those who were there thought it was pure gold.
I think Tom will ask Mary to do that for John.
I think you should write Tom a thank you note.
